scripts.copy-assets: npx mkdirp wwwroot/lib && npx copyfiles -u 2 node_modules/dfe-frontend/dist/**/* wwwroot/lib/dfe-frontend && npx copyfiles -u 2 node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/**/* wwwroot/lib/govuk-frontend && npx copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/@ministryofjustice/frontend/moj/* wwwroot/lib/moj-frontend && npx copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/@ministryofjustice/frontend/moj/**/* wwwroot/lib/moj-frontend
